resources.string: The encrypted data holding your wallet was recently invalidated because your Android lock screen was changed
Set up a lock screen on this device to continue. Go to “Settings” > “Security” > “Screen Lock” and enable the lock screen setting.
You are using a third-party keyboard. You have to use default keyboard.

This app requires that phone has the passcode (screen lock) enabled.

 You may enable it in Android settings.

Please note that when you disabled the PIN on the OS level the security measures in safe storage of your phonе made the previously stored data invalid. You will need to Restore your wallet keys to get back to your wallet.
This app requires your phone\'s PIN in order to keep sensitive data from your wallet in Android\'s secure storage and not in the app itself.
